title: Saddlemen Road Sofa LS Extended Reach Seat with Driver Backrest 808-07B-184BR
description: • Refined split-cushion design seperates the seating surface from the lumbar support, reducing tailbone and back pressure from maximum long-range comfort• Ventilated soft upholstery seating leather provides the most luxurious look and ride• Fitted rain cover specially designed to protect your seat from water and dirt• Tall lumbar support and wide driver saddle supports the back and legs for superior comfort• The streamlined nose improves the rider's reach to the ground• SaddleGel in front and rear reduces tailbone pressure and increases circulation and comfort for both driver and passenger• Extended reach, extends driver's seating area by 2"• Matching passenger backrest/Tour-Pak pad cover sold separately
